 2018-09582018-06-27,  ,  FIN,  , 
ActBank of Canada Act
PrecisApproval of the appointment by the Minister of Finance of MARIETTE MULAIRE of Winnipeg, Manitoba, to be a director of the Board of Directors of the Bank of Canada, to hold office during good behaviour for a term ending on February 28, 2021, in the place of Derek Key, whose term has expired.
AttachmentsAttachment
